mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_birth, mem_postcode, mem_address1, mem_address2) values(#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_postcode}, #{mem_address1}, #{mem_address2})
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.pro_finish-sysdate as dDay, a.* from ( select * from project
where typ_number like '%'||#{type}||'%' and pro_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sysdate-pro_start > 0
where typ_number like '%'||#{type}||'%' and pro_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sysdate-pro_start > 0 and sysdate-pro_start < 15
where typ_number like '%'||#{type}||'%' and pro_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' and sysdate-pro_start > 0 and pro_finish-sysdate > 0 and pro_finish-sysdate < 15
where typ_number like '%'||#{type}||'%' and pro_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' and pro_finish-sysdate < 0
order by pro_number desc ) a ) where rnum between #{startNumber} and #{finishNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT (PRO_NUMBER, PRO_TITLE, PRO_TARGET, PRO_THUMBNAIL, PRO_LOGO, PRO_START, PRO_FINISH, MEM_ID, TYP_NUMBER) values( #{PRO_NUMBER}, #{PRO_TITLE}, #{PRO_TARGET}, #{PRO_THUMBNAIL}, #{PRO_LOGO}, #{PRO_START}, #{PRO_FINISH}, #{MEM_ID}, #{TYP_NUMBER} )
